name: Front End Developer
description: Collaborate with designers, optimize applications,develop features,and maintain brand consistency for user-friendly interfaces.To build and maintain user-friendly, efficient, and accessible web interfaces that deliver a high-quality user experience.As front-end developers work closely with back-end developers to integrate front-end components with server-side logic. They also collaborate with designers to refine UI elements and with QA testers to identify and fix bugs.Focus on optimizing web applications for speed and performance. This includes writing efficient code, minimizing loading times, and ensuring smooth interactions. They often use frameworks and libraries like React, Angular, or Vue.js to streamline development and manage complex user interfaces more effectively.
specification: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Proficiency in front-end frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js
Experience in creating responsive web designs that work seamlessly across various devices and browsers.
Ability to translate UI/UX design wireframes into high-quality, interactive web pages.
Proficiency in using version control systems, particularly Git, for managing and collaborating on code changes
Strong ability to collaborate with designers, back-end developers, and QA testers to integrate front-end components and ensure a cohesive user experience

name: PHP Developer

name: Linux Server Admin
description: Install, configure, and maintain Linux operating systems and related software. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement Linux-based solutions that meet business needs.
